returns._0: True if the account is blacklisted, false if the account is not blacklisted.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._account: The address to remove from the blacklist.

params._newBlacklister: The address of the new blacklister.
